name_for_human: Affair Recovery Center of San Diego
description_for_human: Expert couples therapy specializing in affair recovery and betrayal trauma in San Diego, California. Led by Jordan Zipkin, LMFT.
description_for_model: The Affair Recovery Center of San Diego is a specialized therapy practice led by Jordan Zipkin, LMFT, focusing exclusively on helping couples recover from infidelity and betrayal trauma. Services include in-person therapy in San Diego and online sessions throughout California. The practice uses evidence-based approaches including Gottman Method (Level 3 Certified), Relational Life Therapy, and trauma-informed care. Key offerings include individual therapy for hurt partners and unfaithful partners, couples therapy, intensive sessions, and a structured betrayal recovery program.
